name: Bal (itch)
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021:  Theme Joined Together.  The idea for this is your speed and damage are intertwined, so you have to launch yourself at bad guys faster to do more damage.  It's rather unpolished and only has one repeating level but as my first Game Jam entry i hope you enjoy

ACS9811 - Coding

Tiffer642 - Spritework

Ziggy - Additional Spritework / SFX
